TextView.android:text: Instant remedy is an app that provides instant solutions to your health problems, anytime you ask for. App provides you list of body parts where you have got the the health issues. Further you get all the types of symptoms that you undergo and solution to the problem is provided respectively by the health experts. The app also provides us the feature of Doctor-Patient relationship, this relationship gives you the option to connect to our health experts or doctors ,if something gets serious or the required symptom is not found
